text: @GOPLeader Fauci and Brix, why do we need a CoronaVirus vaccine when there is no vaccine for AIDS, meanwhile 658,507 have died from AIDS...🤔 Asking for US Citizens‼️Stop your nonsense‼️This is all about your vested interest with Gates Foundation and cashing out on a vaccine‼️
